title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 72.7 - Records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 72.7 - Records

State Regulations

Consent forms shall be maintained by the participating law
enforcement agency and shall be searched and made available for or to any law
enforcement agency. Such records shall be kept for 15 years after which they
may be destroyed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
72.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
